archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1468
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a credit agent, I want to be able to update the status of a manual assessment with custom information and pre-defined information, which triggers a notification to the customer in certain situations. E.g. you need to provide X information.

properties.value: Is there a predefined list of manual assessment data that might be required? Does it differ across Customers or is it the same for everyone? Who decides what information needs to be provided (rules in system, or credit agent)?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
